SystemColumn.ValidationFormula: IF(OR([RecordID] = -1, DB_LOOKUP($thisColumn, [EFormType], HASH("RecordID", [RecordID])) = CURRENT_LOADEDVALUE($thisColumn)), TRUE, "You have an old session open, please refresh the page")

SystemColumn.Formula: " ("& [Status] &") PO #"&[Purchase Order Number] &" - "& [Vendor Name] & " - " & NUMBERFORMAT([Total Order], "C")

Column.Name: Item - Qty
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( [Item - Deleted], TRUE, ISBLANK($thisValue), "Item Quantity is a required field", IF( AND( [Item Type] = "Quantity", $thisValue < [Already Received] ), [Item - Description] & " quantity must be more than or equal to " & [Already Received], TRUE ) )

Column.Name: Item - Unit Price
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( [Item - Deleted], TRUE, ISBLANK($thisValue), $thisColumn & " is a required field", AND( [Item Type] = "Quantity", $thisValue = 1 ), "Line Item " & [Item - Description] & ": Unit Price cannot be $1.00. Change your PO type to 'Amount' and amend your price before proceeding.", TRUE )

Column.Name: Total Goods and Services
Previous PO's Total
Column.Formula: ARRAY_FIRST(ARRAY_FIRST( DB_REPORT( "SUM([Total Goods and Services])", "Purchase Order", "[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND [RecordID] <> (" & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([RecordID]) & ") AND [Vendor] = (" & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Vendor]) & ") AND [Source EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Source EFormType]) & " AND [Source RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Source RecordID]) & " AND [Status] IN ('Approved', 'Fully Receipted', 'Approved', 'Completed')", HASH("credentials", "3830c282-dc27-4b81-a873-fa716766037a") ) ))

Column.Name: Quantity Received
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( [Item Type] = "Quantity", IF(ROUND([Already Received] + [Quantity Received], 2) <= ROUND([Item - Qty], 2), TRUE, [Item - Description] & " | The 'Qty Received' is higher than the Quantity Purchased. Please review the 'Qty Received' entered so it does not exceed your purchase order quantity."), TRUE )

Column.Name: Item - Cost
Column.Formula: IF([Item - Deleted], 0, ISBLANK([Item - Tax ID]), 0, [Item - Qty] * [Item - Unit Price])

Column.Name: Item - Posting Amount
Column.ValidationFormula:
LET $alreadyReciepted := IF([Item Type] = "Quantity", [Already Received] * [Item - Unit Price Receipt], [Already Received Amount]);
RETURN IF( ISBLANK($thisValue), "Posting Amount is a required field", IF( $thisValue < $alreadyReciepted, [Item - Description] & " cost must be more than or equal to " & NUMBERFORMAT($alreadyReciepted, "C"), TRUE ) )
Column.Formula: ROUND([Item - Unit Price inc Tax] * [Item - Qty], 2)

Column.Name: Receipt Comment
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( LEN($thisValue) <= 120, TRUE, "The Comment is too large. The maximum length is 120 characters." )

Column.Name: Item - Total Tax
Column.Formula: IF(ISBLANK([Item - Tax Multiplier]), 0, ([Item - Tax Multiplier] - 1) * [Item - Cost] )

Column.Name: Already Received Amount
Received Amount
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( [Item Type] = "Amount", IF(ROUND([Already Received Amount] + ([Received Amount] * [Item - Tax Multiplier]), 2) <= ROUND([Item - Posting Amount], 2), TRUE, [Item - Description] & " | 'Amount Received (excl. Tax)' is higher than Purchase Order amount. Please review your Received Amount then revise your receipt so that it does not exceed your purchase order amount."), TRUE )

Column.Name: Line Complete
Column.Formula: IF( [Item Type] = "Amount", IF([Item - Posting Amount] = [Already Received Amount], TRUE, FALSE), [Item Type] = "Quantity", IF([Item - Qty]= [Already Received], TRUE, FALSE), FALSE )

Column.Name: Total Order Quantity
Column.Formula: SUM(ARRAY_SELECT( ARRAY_WHERE( ARRAY_TRANSPOSE(ARRAY(EACH [Item Type], EACH [Item - Qty])), $(i, item) ARRAY_INDEX($item, 1) = "Quantity" ), $(i, item) ARRAY_INDEX($item, 2) ))

Column.Name: Remaining Budget
Column.Formula: [Overall Budget]-([Previous PO's Total] + IF(ARRAY_INDEXOF(ARRAY("Approved", "Fully Receipted", "Approved", "Completed"), [Status]) <> NULL(), [Total Goods and Services], 0))

Column.Name: Total Remaining Ex Tax
Column.Formula: [Total Posting Amount ex Tax] - [Total Received ex Tax]

Column.Name: Already Received Amount ex Tax
Receipt Items
Column.Formula: ARRAY_TO_HASH_GROUPED(DB_LOOKUPALL( ARRAY("Received Qty", "Amount", "Unit Price", "Amount ex Tax", "Item - Line Number", "Item - Description"), "Purchase Order Receipt", , HASH("parent", ARRAY(EFormType, RecordID)) ), $(k, key)ARRAY_INDEX($key, 5), $(v, value) $value)

Column.Name: Purchase Order Number
Column.ValidationFormula: IF(ISBLANK($thisValue), "Please generate a Purchase Order Number", TRUE)

Column.Name: Bypass Complete
Column.Formula: AND( [Bypass Budget Value] = [Overall Budget], [Total Order] = [Bypass Order Value] )

Column.Name: Parent Title
Column.Formula: IF( ARRAY_INDEX([Parent], 1) = "Procurement", [Procurement Title], ARRAY_INDEX([Parent], 1) = "Contract", [Contract Name], ARRAY_INDEX([Parent], 1) = "Project", [Project Title], ARRAY_INDEX([Parent], 1) = "Purchase Order Agreement", [PO Agreement Title] )

Column.Name: Parent Number
Column.Formula: IF( ARRAY_INDEX([Parent], 1) = "Procurement", [Sourcing RecordID], ARRAY_INDEX([Parent], 1) = "Contract", [Contract Number], ARRAY_INDEX([Parent], 1) = "Project", [Project Number], ARRAY_INDEX([Parent], 1) = "Purchase Order Agreement", ARRAY_INDEX([Parent], 2) )

Column.Name: Approval Not Required
Column.DefaultValueFormula: DB_LOOKUP( "Not Required", "Approval Workflow", HASH("Submission Type", "Purchase Order", "LineNumber", 1) )

Column.Name: Parent Structure
Global Settings
Contract Module Settings

TextCriterion.Text: [LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND [Output] = 'Purchase Order' AND [Status] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Awarded'
[Contract Title] IS NOT EMPTY
[LineNumber] = 1
[Contract Number] IS NOT EMPTY
[Company Name] IS NOT EMPTY

"

Select the contract to link this purchase order to
Select the procurement plan to link this purchase order to
Unique reference number for this purchase order

FieldEntry.Formula: DB_LOOKUP( "Purchase Order Number", "Purchase Order", "[RecordID] <> " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([RecordID]) & " AND [Purchase Order Number] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Purchase Order Number - Temp]) ) <> NULL()

ChangeFieldValues.Description: Check if Purchase Order number is in use
Set PO number, clear validation fields

DisplayMessage.MessageTemplate: Purchase Order Number already in use.

Binding.Expression: AND( [Manually Specify Purchase Order Number] = TRUE, [Purchase Order Number] = NULL() )
AND( ISBLANK([Purchase Order Number]), [Status] = "Draft", [Parent] = NULL(), [Manually Specify Purchase Order Number] == TRUE )

Label.Text: Total budget available for this agreement
The remaining balance for the agreement
Required delivery date of this purchase order
The vendor or second party on the agreement
The department which owns this agreement
Enter any additional details or comments related to this purchase order
Name of the record this purchase order relates to

Binding.Expression: IF( ARRAY_INDEX([Parent], 1) = "Procurement", "Procurement", ARRAY_INDEX([Parent], 1) = "Contract", "Contract", ARRAY_INDEX([Parent], 1) = "Project", "Project", ARRAY_INDEX([Parent], 1) = "Purchase Order Agreement", "Purchase order agreement" ) & " title"

Label.Text: Unique reference number of the <parent> record

Binding.Expression: "Unique reference number of the " & LOWER(ARRAY_INDEX([Parent], 1)) & " record"

IF( ARRAY_INDEX([Parent], 1) = "Procurement", "Procurement number", ARRAY_INDEX([Parent], 1) = "Contract", "Contract number", ARRAY_INDEX([Parent], 1) = "Project", "Project number", ARRAY_INDEX([Parent], 1) = "Purchase Order Agreement", "Purchase order agreement number" )

Label.Text: Total value of the parent record
The remaining balance for the agreement
Unique reference number for this purchase order

FieldEntry.Formula: DB_LOOKUP( "Purchase Order Number", "Purchase Order", "[RecordID] <> " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([RecordID]) & " AND [Purchase Order Number] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Purchase Order Number - Temp]) ) <> NULL()

ChangeFieldValues.Description: Check if Purchase Order number is in use
Set PO number, clear validation fields

DisplayMessage.MessageTemplate: Purchase Order Number already in use.

Binding.Expression: AND( [Manually Specify Purchase Order Number] = TRUE, [Purchase Order Number] = NULL() )
AND( ISBLANK([Purchase Order Number]), [Status] = "Draft", [Parent] <> NULL, [Manually Specify Purchase Order Number] == TRUE )

Information.Text: This is becomes the "Delivery Date" on the PO. If a contract, enter in the Contract End date.

Label.Text: Required delivery date of this purchase order
The vendor or second party on the agreement
The department which owns this agreement
Enter any additional details or comments related to this purchase order

Save.Description: Prevent the nav task from asking to save

Binding.Expression:
"
"

Label.Text: Use this area to bulk import items from an excel spreadsheet. Importing will overwrite any items already in the item list.

Information.Text: Quantity Type: When purchasing multiple items with a unit price Amount Type: Draw down PO with multiple invoices/progress payments

Binding.Expression:
"
"
AND( [Status] = "Draft Revision", EBMS_GET_CHILD_RECORD_COUNT(EFormType, RecordID, "Purchase Order Revision") > 0 )

ChangeFieldValues.Description: Mark Line Deleted (only when item has been approved)

Binding.Expression: AND( OR( [Status] == "Draft", [Status] == "Draft Revision" ), [Already Received] == 0, [Already Received Amount] == 0 )

"
"

Label.Text: Order amount exceeds the total budgeted amount, this may be unintentional. If you intend to proceed with the current figures click the button below.
Total value of the parent record
Value of goods and services on this purchase order
Enter justification or any additional comments on bypassing the budgeted value

Binding.Expression: AND( [Bypass Complete] <> TRUE, [Total Goods and Services] > [Overall Budget], NOT(ISBLANK([Parent])), OR( [Status]="Draft", [Status]="Draft Revision" ) )

"
"

Label.Text: Order amount exceeds the total budgeted amount. This was acknowledged by the individual listed below.
Bypassed budget value for the agreement
User who confirmed bypass of budget
Date the bypass of budget was acknowledged
Justification or additional comments on bypassing the budgeted value
Value of goods and services on this purchase order

Binding.Expression: AND( [Bypass Complete] = TRUE, [Total Order] > [Overall Budget], NOT(ISBLANK([Parent])), OR( [Status]="Draft", [Status]="Draft Revision" ) )

Information.Text: Amount Received to Date excludes tax.
Quantity Type: When purchasing multiple items with a unit price Amount Type: Draw down PO with multiple invoices/progress payments

Binding.Expression:
"
"

FieldEntry.Formula: ARRAY_SELECT( RANGE(1, ARRAY_LENGTH(EACH [Item - Number])), $(i, item) NULL() )
ARRAY_SELECT( RANGE(1, ARRAY_LENGTH(EACH [Item - Number])), $(i, item) NULL() )

Binding.Expression: IF( [Receive Items] = TRUE, "Cancel Receiving Order", "Receive Order" )

Label.Text: Any additional comments or details to be displayed on the receipt

Binding.Expression: NUMBERFORMAT([Item - Unit Price] - [Already Received Amount ex Tax],"C")

Title.Text: All items have been receipted for this purchase order

Binding.Expression:
"
"

"

" & IF( [Status] <> "Approved", "Approval is required for this purchase order", "The section below shows the approval history for this purchase order" ) & "

"

Label.Text: Enter a reference number for approvals that happened outside of the system

Binding.Expression:
IF( [Status] = "Approved", "View submission",
[Pending Draft Submission] == TRUE, //checks if any child submission record is in draft or submitted "Prepare approval submission",
[Pending Submission] == TRUE, //checks if any child submission record is in draft or submitted "Check status and details",
[Submission Count] >=1, "Prepare resubmission",
"Prepare approval submission" )

TextCriterion.Text: [Type] = 'Purchase Order'

CASE WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'Approved (Final)' THEN '#0b732b'
WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'Rejected' THEN '#900000'
WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'Pending' THEN '#ffffff'
WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'In Progress' THEN '#ffff00'
ELSE '#efefef' END

CASE WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'Approved (Final)' THEN 'white'
WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'Rejected' THEN 'white'
WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'Cancelled' THEN '#b3b3b3'
WHEN [Status] = 'Approved' THEN '#0b732b'
WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'Approved' THEN '#00a06d'
WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'In Progress' THEN 'black'
WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'Pending' THEN 'black'
ELSE 'black' END

Binding.Expression:
LET $set := ARRAY_SELECT( RANGE(1, [Submission Count]), $(i,item) HASH( "value", $item, "text", $item ) );
RETURN ARRAY_CONCAT( HASH("value", 0, "text", "All"), $set )

"
"

Label.Text: Only use this button if you would like to make changes to your purchase order. You will need to resubmit it for approval.

Binding.Expression:
"
"

Label.Text: Only use this button to close the PO when not all of the items/services have been fully receipted (eg. $10k quote for services was provided, but only $7k of services were required and invoiced).

TextCriterion.Text:
CASE
--Check if user is in role which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' THEN TRUE
-- Check if user is an approver on an in progress submission for this record, assuming guest approver WHEN ( STEP TO CHILD [Submission] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND [To].[Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [RecordID] AND [To].[Status] = 'Submitted' ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
ELSE FALSE END

CASE
--Check if user is in role which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' THEN TRUE
-- IF source is null, Originator has access WHEN [Sourcing RecordID] IS EMPTY AND [Source RecordID] IS EMPTY THEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All'
-- Check if parent is a Procurement and user has access to parent WHEN [Sourcing RecordID] IS NOT EMPTY THEN ( CASE WHEN (STEP TO PARENT [Procurement] ON [Sourcing RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND ( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE WHEN (STEP TO CHILD [Submission] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND [To].[Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [RecordID] AND [To].[Status] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Submitted' ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END ) -- Check if parent is a Contract and user has access to parent WHEN [Source RecordID] IS NOT EMPTY THEN ( CASE WHEN (STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Source RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND ( CASE --check that the user is in a role which always has access to the contract WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] THEN TRUE --check that the contract is not restricted, and the user is in one of these roles in addition WHEN [To].[Restricted] <> TRUE AND ( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' ) THEN TRUE
ELSE FALSE END ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE WHEN (STEP TO CHILD [Submission] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND [To].[Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [RecordID] AND [To].[Status] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Submitted' ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END ) -- Check if user is an approver on an in progress submission for this record WHEN ( STEP TO CHILD [Submission] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND [To].[Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [RecordID] AND [To].[Status] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Submitted' ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
ELSE FALSE
END

CASE
--Check if user is in role which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' THEN TRUE
-- IF source is null, Originator has access WHEN [Sourcing RecordID] IS EMPTY AND [Source RecordID] IS EMPTY THEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
-- Check if parent is a Procurement and user has access to parent WHEN [Sourcing RecordID] IS NOT EMPTY THEN (STEP TO PARENT [Procurement] ON [Source RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0)
-- Check if parent is a Contract and user has access to parent WHEN [Source RecordID] IS NOT EMPTY THEN (STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Source RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0)
ELSE FALSE
END

CASE WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Business Partners' THEN TRUE
WHEN [Source EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Contract' THEN
( STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Source RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0 )
WHEN [Source EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Procurement' THEN
( ( STEP TO PARENT [Procurement] ON [To].[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0 )
OR
(STEP TO [Conflict of Interest Declaration] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Assignee] AND(CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'External Evaluation Panel Members') AND [To].[Procurement RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Source RecordID] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0 ) )
ELSE CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' END
STEP TO CHILD [Submission] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND [To].[Parent RecordID] = [RecordID] AND [To].[Status] <> 'Draft' ) GET COUNT(1) > 0

CASE WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Business Partners' THEN TRUE
WHEN [Source EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Contract' THEN
( STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Source RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0 )
WHEN [Source EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Procurement' THEN
( STEP TO PARENT [Procurement] ON [To].[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0 )
ELSE CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' END

CASE WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Users' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Record Officers' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Executive Users' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] THEN TRUE
WHEN [Source EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Contract' THEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Source RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username in Role] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0 ) WHEN [Source EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Procurement' THEN ( ( STEP TO PARENT [Procurement] ON [Source RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND [To].[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0 )
OR
(STEP TO [Conflict of Interest Declaration] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Assignee] AND(CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'External Evaluation Panel Members') AND [To].[Procurement RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Source RecordID] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0 ) )
END -- Future-proofed this for if they pick up Procurement Planning. May need to add additional roles.
STEP TO CHILD [Submission] ON ( [To].[Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND [To].[Status] <> 'Draft' ) GET COUNT(1)>0

CASE WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Users' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Record Officers' THEN TRUE
WHEN [Source EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Contract' THEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Source RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username in Role] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Managers' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Business Managers' ) ) ) GET COUNT(1) > 0 )
WHEN [Source EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Procurement' THEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Procurement] ON [To].[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND [Source RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0 )
ELSE CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] END

CASE
WHEN [RecordID] = NULL OR [RecordID] = 0 THEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators'
WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' THEN TRUE
WHEN [Source EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Contract' THEN
( STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Source RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0 )
WHEN [Source EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Procurement' THEN
( ( STEP TO PARENT [Procurement] ON [To].[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0 )
OR
(STEP TO [Conflict of Interest Declaration] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Assignee] AND(CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'External Evaluation Panel Members') AND [To].[Procurement RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Source RecordID] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0 ) )
ELSE CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' END
STEP TO CHILD [Submission] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND [To].[Parent RecordID] = [RecordID] AND [To].[Status] <> 'Draft' ) GET COUNT(1) > 0

CASE
WHEN [RecordID] = NULL OR [RecordID] = 0 THEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators'
WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' THEN TRUE
WHEN [Source EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Contract' THEN
( STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Source RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0 )
WHEN [Source EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Procurement' THEN
( ( STEP TO PARENT [Procurement] ON [To].[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0 )
OR
(STEP TO [Conflict of Interest Declaration] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Assignee] AND(CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'External Evaluation Panel Members') AND [To].[Procurement RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Source RecordID] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0 ) )
ELSE CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' END
STEP TO CHILD [Submission] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND [To].[Parent RecordID] = [RecordID] AND [To].[Status] <> 'Draft' ) GET COUNT(1) > 0

CASE WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] THEN TRUE
WHEN [Source EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Contract' THEN
( STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Source RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0 )
WHEN [Source EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Procurement' THEN
( ( STEP TO PARENT [Procurement] ON [To].[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0 )
OR
(STEP TO [Conflict of Interest Declaration] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Assignee] AND(CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'External Evaluation Panel Members') AND [To].[Procurement RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Source RecordID] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0 ) )
ELSE CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' END
STEP TO CHILD [Submission] ON ( [To].[Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND [To].[Status] <> 'Draft' ) GET COUNT(1)>0

CASE WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] THEN TRUE
WHEN [Source EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Contract' THEN
( STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Source RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0 )
WHEN [Source EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Procurement' THEN
( STEP TO PARENT [Procurement] ON [To].[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0 )
ELSE CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' END

Event.Name: Balance Line Item
Event.Description: Brings PO value down to Receipted Qty/ Amt

FieldEntry.Formula: IF([Item Type]#$eventargs = "Amount", [Already Received Amount ex Tax]#$eventargs, [Item - Unit Price]#$eventargs)

TriggerCustomEvent.Description: Trigger - Balance Line Item (Brings PO value down to the receipted Qty/Amt)

FieldEntry.Formula: ARRAY_SELECT( RANGE(1, ARRAY_LENGTH(EACH [Item - Number])), $(i, item) NULL() )
ARRAY_SELECT( RANGE(1, ARRAY_LENGTH(EACH [Item - Number])), $(i, item) NULL() )

ChangeFieldValues.Description: Set Status to Fully Receipted if all line items are Completed

FormulaCriterion.Formula: HASH_GET([Global Settings], "Owns Integrated Module - Purchase Orders") = TRUE
HASH_GET([Contract Module Settings], "Auto-Populate Expenditure to Date") = TRUE

FieldEntry.Formula: HASH_GET($eventargs, "Previous Submission Round")//this will be 0 for the first round of submission + 1
HASH_GET($eventargs, "Previous Submission RecordID") //it will be null for the first roundof submission

TriggerCustomEvent.Description: Call: Link Next Round (on last submission)
